verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> couldn't <S%H3201><s%> control <S%H662><s%> himself before all those who stood <S%H5324><s%> before him, <S%H7121><s%> and he cried, "Cause <S%H3318><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to go out <S%H3318><s%> from me! <S%H376><s%>" No one else stood <S%H5975><s%> with him, <S%H3130><s%> while Joseph made himself known <S%H3045><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>
He wept <S%H6963><s%> aloud. <S%H5414><s%> The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> heard, <S%H1004><s%> and the house of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> heard. <S%H8085><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "I am Joseph! <S%H3130><s%> Does my father <S%H1><s%> still live? <S%H2416><s%>" His brothers <S%H251><s%> couldn't <S%H3201><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> him; <S%H926><s%> for they were terrified at his presence. <S%H6440><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "Come near <S%H5066><s%> to me, <S%H5066><s%> please." They came near. "He said, <S%H559><s%> I am Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> whom you sold <S%H4376><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Now don't <S%H6087><s%> be grieved, nor angry <S%H2734><s%> with yourselves, <S%H5869><s%> that you sold <S%H4376><s%> me here, <S%H430><s%> for God sent <S%H7971><s%> me before you <S%H6440><s%> to preserve life. <S%H4241><s%>

For these two years <S%H8141><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> has been in <S%H7130><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and there are yet five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> in which there will be neither <S%H369><s%> plowing <S%H2758><s%> nor harvest. <S%H7105><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me before you <S%H6440><s%> to preserve <S%H7760><s%> for you <S%H6440><s%> a remnant in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and to save you alive <S%H2421><s%> by a great <S%H1419><s%> deliverance. <S%H6413><s%>

So now it wasn't <S%H7971><s%> you who sent me here, <S%H430><s%> but God, and he has made <S%H7760><s%> me a father <S%H1><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> lord <S%H113><s%> of all his house, <S%H1004><s%> and ruler <S%H4910><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Hurry, <S%H4116><s%> and go up <S%H5927><s%> to my father, <S%H1><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H1121><s%> 'This is what your son Joseph <S%H3130><s%> says, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has made <S%H7760><s%> me lord <S%H113><s%> of all Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Come down <S%H3381><s%> to me. <S%H5975><s%> Don't wait.

You shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and you will be near <S%H7138><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> you, your children, your children <S%H1121><s%>'s children, <S%H1121><s%> your flocks, <S%H6629><s%> your herds, <S%H1241><s%> and all that you have.

There I will nourish <S%H3557><s%> you; <S%H2568><s%> for there are yet five years <S%H8141><s%> of famine; <S%H7458><s%> lest you come to poverty, <S%H3423><s%> you, <S%H1004><s%> and your household, and all that you have."'
Behold, <S%H5869><s%> your eyes see, <S%H7200><s%> and the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of my brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> that it is my mouth <S%H6310><s%> that speaks to you. <S%H1696><s%>

You shall tell <S%H5046><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> of all my glory <S%H3519><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and of all that you have seen. <S%H7200><s%> You shall hurry <S%H4116><s%> and bring my father <S%H1><s%> down here. <S%H3381><s%>"
He fell <S%H5307><s%> on his brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s neck, <S%H6677><s%> and wept, <S%H1058><s%> and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> on his neck. <S%H6677><s%>
He kissed <S%H5401><s%> all his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> on them. <S%H310><s%> After that his brothers <S%H251><s%> talked with him. <S%H1696><s%>

The report <S%H6963><s%> of it was heard <S%H8085><s%> in Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s brothers <S%H251><s%> have come. <S%H935><s%>" It pleased <S%H5869><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> well, <S%H3190><s%> and <S%H5869><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Tell <S%H559><s%> your brothers, <S%H251><s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'Do this. <S%H2943><s%> Load your animals, <S%H1165><s%> and go, <S%H3212><s%> travel <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your households, <S%H1004><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> to me, <S%H5414><s%> and I will give you the good <S%H2898><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and you will eat <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>'

Now you are commanded: <S%H6680><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this. <S%H3947><s%> Take wagons <S%H5699><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and for your wives, <S%H802><s%> and bring <S%H5375><s%> your father, <S%H1><s%> and come. <S%H935><s%>
Also, <S%H5869><s%> don't <S%H2347><s%> concern yourselves about your belongings, <S%H3627><s%> for the good <S%H2898><s%> of all of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt is yours. <S%H4714><s%>"

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3130><s%> Joseph gave <S%H5414><s%> them wagons, <S%H5699><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them provision <S%H6720><s%> for the way. <S%H1870><s%>

He gave <S%H5414><s%> each one of them <S%H376><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of clothing, <S%H8071><s%> but to Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of clothing. <S%H8071><s%>

He sent <S%H7971><s%> the following <S%H2063><s%> to his father: <S%H1><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> donkeys <S%H860><s%> loaded <S%H5375><s%> with the good things <S%H2898><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> female donkeys <S%H2543><s%> loaded <S%H5375><s%> with grain <S%H1250><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> and provision <S%H4202><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%> by the way. <S%H1870><s%>

So he sent <S%H7971><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> and they departed. <S%H3212><s%> He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7264><s%> "See that you don't quarrel on the way. <S%H1870><s%>"
They went up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father. <S%H1><s%>

They told <S%H5046><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is still alive, <S%H2416><s%> and he is ruler <S%H4910><s%> over all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>" His heart <S%H3820><s%> fainted, <S%H6313><s%> for he didn't <S%H539><s%> believe them.

They told <S%H1696><s%> him all the words <S%H1697><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which he had said <S%H1696><s%> to them. <S%H7200><s%> When he saw the wagons <S%H5699><s%> which Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> him, <S%H7307><s%> the spirit of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%> revived. <S%H2421><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is enough. <S%H7227><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> is still alive. <S%H2416><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> and see him <S%H7200><s%> before I die. <S%H4191><s%>"
